name: Ninjam
description:
Get your friends together and see who is the best pixel ninja!

Takes about a minute to load. Use bottom right button to go full-screen.

Sounds sometimes doesn't work, try re-loading the page!

Made by the Bu$y Boys Victor Shi, Justin Koh, and Mladen Stambolija at TOJam 13 (http://www.tojam.ca/home/default.asp).
